verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and all his <S%H2428>army<s%>, and all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> of his <S%H3027%H4475>dominion<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H559>tell<s%> him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>:

And thou shalt not escape <S%H4422>out<s%> of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, but shalt <S%H8610>surely<s%> be <S%H8610>taken<s%>, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with thee <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Yet <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, O <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of thee, Thou shalt not <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>:

But thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>: and with the <S%H4955>burnings<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> which were <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, so shall they <S%H8313>burn<s%> odours for thee; and they will <S%H5594>lament<s%> thee, saying, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> <S%H113>lord<s%>! for I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> unto <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>,

When the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and against all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%>, against <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>, and against <S%H5825>Azekah<s%>: for these <S%H4013>defenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

¶ This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with all the <S%H5971>people<s%> which were at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> unto them;

That every <S%H376>man<s%> should let his <S%H5650>manservant<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>maidservant<s%>, being an <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> or an <S%H5680>Hebrewess<s%>, <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>; that none should <S%H5647>serve<s%> himself of them, to wit, of a <S%H3064>Jew<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>.

Now when all the <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, which had <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that every <S%H376>one<s%> should let his <S%H5650>manservant<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H8198>maidservant<s%>, <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>, that none should <S%H5647>serve<s%> themselves of them any more, then they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%>, and let them <S%H7971>go<s%>.

But <S%H310>afterward<s%> they <S%H7725>turned<s%>, and caused the <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>, whom they had let <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%>, to <S%H7725>return<s%>, and brought them into <S%H3533%H3533>subjection<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>.
¶ Therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; I <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> let ye <S%H7971>go<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> an <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%>, which hath been <S%H4376>sold<s%> unto thee; and when he hath <S%H5647>served<s%> thee <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, thou shalt let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> from thee: but your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto me, neither <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%>.

And ye were <S%H3117>now<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%>, and had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>, in <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>; and ye had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>:

But ye <S%H7725>turned<s%> and <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and caused every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, whom ye had <S%H7971>set<s%> at <S%H2670>liberty<s%> at their <S%H5315>pleasure<s%>, to <S%H7725>return<s%>, and brought them into <S%H3533>subjection<s%>, to be unto you for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Ye have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto me, in <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>: behold, I <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> a <S%H1865>liberty<s%> for you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, to the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and to the <S%H7458>famine<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you to be <S%H2189%H2113>removed<s%> into all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which have not <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which they had <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, when they <S%H3772>cut<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H8147>twain<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> between the <S%H1335>parts<s%> thereof,

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, which <S%H5674>passed<s%> between the <S%H1335>parts<s%> of the <S%H5695>calf<s%>;

I will even <S%H5414>give<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>: and their dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall be for <S%H3978>meat<s%> unto the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>, which are gone <S%H5927>up<s%> from you.

Behold, I will <S%H6680>command<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> to this <S%H5892>city<s%>; and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> against it, and <S%H3920>take<s%> it, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>: and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> without an <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>.
